mapper.insert: insert into blog(title, content, isPublic, createTime, tid, uid) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{isPublic}, NOW(), #{tid}, #{uid})
mapper.select: select b.bid, b.title, b.content, b.view, b.isPublic, b.createTime, t.name from blog b, type t where b.uid = #{uid} and b.tid = t.tid

select b.bid, b.title, b.content, b.createTime, -- DATE_FORMAT( b.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) createTime, b.view, u.username, t.name tname from blog b, user u, type t where b.tid = #{tid} AND b.uid = u.uid AND b.tid = t.tid AND b.isPublic = 1 ORDER BY createTime DESC limit #{offset}, #{pageCount}
select count(bid) from blog where isPublic = 1
